project_summary: A React-based todo list application with core CRUD functionality for managing tasks, including add, edit, complete, and delete operations.

tasks.title: Set up React project with TypeScript
tasks.description: Initialize a new React project using Vite with TypeScript template. Configure ESLint and Prettier for code quality. Set up the basic folder structure.

tasks.title: Define Todo data model and types
tasks.description: Create TypeScript interfaces for Todo items including id, title, description, completed status, and timestamps. Define any utility types needed.

tasks.title: Implement state management
tasks.description: Set up React state management using useState or useReducer for the todo list. Create custom hooks for todo operations (add, update, delete, toggle).

tasks.title: Build TodoList component
tasks.description: Create the main TodoList component that renders all todos. Include proper list rendering with keys, empty state handling, and loading states.

tasks.title: Build TodoItem component
tasks.description: Create individual TodoItem component with checkbox for completion, title display, and action buttons. Include inline editing capability.

tasks.title: Implement add todo form
tasks.description: Create an input form to add new todos. Include form validation, keyboard shortcuts (Enter to submit, Escape to cancel), and clear after submit.

tasks.title: Add delete functionality with confirmation
tasks.description: Implement delete todo functionality with a confirmation dialog to prevent accidental deletions. Add undo capability within a short time window.

tasks.title: Style the application
tasks.description: Apply CSS styling for a clean, modern look. Use CSS modules or styled-components. Add transitions, hover states, and responsive design.

tasks.title: Add local storage persistence
tasks.description: Implement local storage to persist todos across browser sessions. Handle storage errors gracefully and add sync indicator.
